name: UEFA Champions League Trophy
description: Manchester City won their first-ever UEFA Champions League title in 2023 with a 1-0 victory over Inter Milan.
howItWasWon: Rodri scored the only goal in the final, securing the win and completing City's historic treble.

name: FIFA World Cup Golden Boot
description: Kylian Mbappé won the Golden Boot at the 2022 FIFA World Cup for scoring 8 goals in the tournament.
howItWasWon: Mbappé scored a hat-trick in the final against Argentina, taking his total to 8 goals, but France lost in penalties.

name: Ballon d'Or
description: Lionel Messi won his 8th Ballon d'Or for his outstanding performances, including winning the FIFA World Cup with Argentina.
howItWasWon: Messi's leadership, goals, and playmaking helped Argentina win the 2022 World Cup, making him the top candidate.
